remarks: The size of a ball increases monotonically with its radius. (Contributed by NM, 20-Sep-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Aug-2015.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Mar-2018.)
statement: ssblps $p |- ( ( ( D e. ( PsMet ` X ) /\ P e. X ) /\ ( R e. RR* /\ S e. RR* ) /\ R <_ S ) -> ( P ( ball ` D ) R ) C_ ( P ( ball ` D ) S ) ) $.
